About the Company: Rane (Madras)Ltd is the manufacturer of steering & suspension systems for every segment of automobile industry, viz Passenger cars, Multi utility vehicles, Light commercial vehicles, Heavy commercial vehicles and Farm tractors. The Product range of the company includes:Manual Steering Gears-Re - circulating ball type and Rack and Pinion. Steering Linkages -Tie rod assemblies,Drag link assemblies,Centre link assemblies and Gear shift ball joints.Suspension Linkages-Lower control arms,Lower & Upper,Suspension ball joints,Inner & Outer ball joints and Axle ball joints.
